title: Penrose limit of T-dual of MNa solution and dual orbifold field theory
abstract: In this paper we study the Penrose limit of the T-dual of the MNa solution and its field theory dual, in order to better understand the effect of T-duality in this case. We find a matching of string pp wave oscillators and their masses to the field theory modes, that are rearranged after T-duality. The effect of T-duality on the long "annulon-type" operators is found, as a symmetry of the 2+1 dimensional confining theory with spontaneous susy breaking.
